block.p: BASEBALL National League METS--Optioned INF David Lamb to Norfolk of the International League. Recalled RHP Grant Roberts from Norfolk. ARIZONA DIAMONDBACKS--Acquired RHP Curt Schilling from the Philadelphia Phillies for 1B-OF Travis Lee, LHP Omar Daal, RHP Vicente Padilla and RHP Nelson Figueroa. CINCINNATI REDS--Traded RHP Manny Aybar to Florida for RHP Jorge Cordova. Called up RHP Rob Bell from Louisville of the International League. FLORIDA MARLINS--Designated LHP Ron Mahay for assignment. LOS ANGELES DODGERS--Acquired RHP Ismael Valdes from the Chicago Cubs for RHP Jamie Arnold, OF Jorge Piedra and cash considerations. PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES--Traded OF Rob Ducey to the Toronto Blue Jays for a player to be named.

BASEBALL National League METS--Optioned INF David Lamb to Norfolk of the International League. Recalled RHP Grant Roberts from Norfolk. ARIZONA DIAMONDBACKS--Acquired RHP Curt Schilling from the Philadelphia Phillies for 1B-OF Travis Lee, LHP Omar Daal, RHP Vicente Padilla and RHP Nelson Figueroa. CINCINNATI REDS--Traded RHP Manny Aybar to Florida for RHP Jorge Cordova. Called up RHP Rob Bell from Louisville of the International League. FLORIDA MARLINS--Designated LHP Ron Mahay for assignment. LOS ANGELES DODGERS--Acquired RHP Ismael Valdes from the Chicago Cubs for RHP Jamie Arnold, OF Jorge Piedra and cash considerations. PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES--Traded OF Rob Ducey to the Toronto Blue Jays for a player to be named.
Amercian League ANAHEIM ANGELS--Activated LHP Scott Schoeneweis from the 15-day disabled list. Sent INF Justin Baughman to Edmonton of the PCL.

BASKETBALL National Basketball Association ATLANTA HAWKS--Signed C Hanno Mottola to a two-year contract. Women's National Basketball Association DETROIT SHOCK--Activated G Tamicha Jackson. Placed F Oksana Zakaluzhnaya on the injured list.

FOOTBALL National Football League CHICAGO BEARS--Waived DB John Williams. Signed DL Jerome King. CINCINNATI BENGALS--Claimed CB Sirr Parker off waivers from the Carolina Panthers. GREEN BAY PACKERS--Placed WR-KR Mandrell Dean on waivers. INDIANAPOLIS COLTS--Signed LB Rob Morris to a five-year contract. JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS--Waived OL Ethan Weidle. Signed OL Eric Moss. MINNESOTA VIKINGS--Announced the retirement of TE Chad Fann. SAN DIEGO CHARGERS--Signed DE Jason Chorak and DE Seneca Knight. Reached an injury settlement with DE Wayne Hampton. Released QB Mike Burton and WR-KR Damon Gourdine. TENNESSEE TITANS--Agreed to terms with WR Carl Pickens on a five-year contract.

HOCKEY National Hockey League RANGERS--Named Al Coates vice president and general manager of Hartford Sports. ATLANTA THRASHERS--Agreed to terms with G Norm Maracle. CALGARY FLAMES--Signed F Dave Lowry. COLORADO AVALANCHE--Signed C Stephane Yelle and D Eric Messier. DALLAS STARS--Signed D Brad Lukowich, G Marty Turco and D Jeff Tory to one-year contracts. MINNESOTA WILD--Agreed to terms with RW Sergei Krivokrasov. PHILADELPHIA FLYERS--Signed C Derek Plante to a one-year contract. TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING--Signed G Dan Cloutier and LW Dwayne Hay to one-year contracts. VANCOUVER CANUCKS--Signed G Bob Essensa and RW Jarkko Ruutu. East Coast Hockey League GREENSBORO GENERALS--Signed RW Alexander Trembley.

COLLEGE ADELPHI--Named Jeffrey Lipton women's volleyball coach. ALLENTOWN--Named Scott Coval athletic director. ARIZONA STATE--Named Gene Smith, athletic director, and Frank Kush special assistant to the athletic director. Suspended senior QB Ryan Kealy indefinitely for a violation of team rules. BARTON--Announced the resignation of Scott Ginn, women's women's soccer coach, to take a similar position at Middle Tennessee State. CENTRAL CONNECTICUT STATE--Named Gene Gubbs sports information director. DEPAUL--Announced the resignation of Laure Schingen, women's soccer coach. DRAKE--Named Gary Grimes assistant softball coach and Matt Inskeep equipment manager. EASTERN CONNECTICUT STATE--Named Clint Bowman men's and women's interim cross-country and track coach. EASTERN MICHIGAN--Named Charles Branch wrestling coach. FAYETTEVILLE STATE--Named William Carver athletics director. IMMACULATA--Named Patricia Canterino athletic director and women's basketball coach. LSU--Promoted associate sports information director Michael Bonnette to sports information director. MERCER--Named Nick Stutsman men's and women's tennis coach. MICHIGAN STATE--Named Nancy Wenzel women's assistant track coach and Christie Shefchunas assistant swimming coach. NORTHERN IOWA--Promoted women's assistant basketball coach Colleen Heimstead to athletic department compliance-life skills coordinator. OREGON STATE--Suspended WR Robert Prescott and WR Junior Adams indefinitely. ST. JOHN'S--Named Pechone Stepps women's assistant basketball coach. SOUTHERN MAINE--Named David Venditti women's ice hockey coach. THE CITADEL--Announced QB Drew Johnson is academically ineligible. TULANE--Named Donna Turner assistant athletic director for media relations. VILLANOVA--Promoted Susan Guarino to coordinator for office services. Named Kellie Cookus coordinator for intramurals and recreation, Joanna Franklin-Range assistant trainer, Shannon O'Neil women's lacrosse coach and Patrick McGowan coordinator of marketing, promotions and special events. WENTWORTH TECH--Named Kevin Russell men's volleyball coach.
